Description of incident: Hume Lake Christian Camps notified employees of a data breach when they were a victim of a phishing scam. "On March 4, 2016, we discovered that between February 29, 2016 and March 4, 2016, as a result of a phishing incident, an unauthorized third party gained accessed to a Hume Lake employee's email account and, in turn, may have accessed files containing certain personal information."More Information: http://oag.ca.gov/ecrime/databreach/reports/sb24-61646
